about_the_game:
Capsule Rush is a third-person 3D platformer game set in different environments, each with increasing difficulty. Compete against other capsules for the fastest time and get ready for the challenges waiting ahead!

There are currently 10 different levels scaling from easy to very hard to choose between. The goal is jumping from one platform to another to make your way towards the finish line.

Each level contains obstacles which are recognized as moving enemies which you have to avoid by all means because if you touch one its instant death. You can avoid enemies by jumping over or around them.

You can also customize your capsule with different hats for a more appealing appearance.

If you are looking for an extra challenge you can also compete against other players for the fastest time, which is displayed on an in-game leaderboard.

Capsule Rush is a third-person 3D platformer game set in different environments, each with increasing difficulty. Compete against other capsules for the fastest time and get ready for the challenges waiting ahead!

There are currently 10 different levels scaling from easy to very hard to choose between. The goal is jumping from one platform to another to make your way towards the finish line.

Each level contains obstacles which are recognized as moving enemies which you have to avoid by all means because if you touch one its instant death. You can avoid enemies by jumping over or around them.

You can also customize your capsule with different hats for a more appealing appearance.

If you are looking for an extra challenge you can also compete against other players for the fastest time, which is displayed on an in-game leaderboard.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04, CentOS 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 130 Mac Edition
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Capsule Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, AMD is Radeon HD 2900 GT
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Capsule Rush is a third-person 3D platformer game set in different environments. You spawn in on a platform, along the journey you'll have to traverse through many obstacles in order to reach the finish line. Compete against others for the fastest time and buckle up for the challenges waiting ahead!
